response.overview: In a desperate bid to save her crumbling relationship, Ula confronts her boyfriend Tyler’s gambling addiction, only to find herself drawn into a haunting legacy tied to his mysterious family in Mount Anaga. As she grapples with the weight of unfulfilled dreams and the echoes of a dark past, Ula must navigate a treacherous path where the line between reality and the supernatural blurs. With time running out, she races against the clock to uncover the truth before it consumes them both.
response.title: Gara's Return
